H0.text: Karl Eisner created which multitool. Bavarian Blade

H1.text: Karl Eisner created which multitool. Eisner's Edge

H2.text: Karl Eisner created which multitool. German Gizmo

H3.text: Karl Eisner created which multitool. Swiss knife

A4.text: Karl Elsener, then owner of a company that made surgical equipment, set out to manufacture the knives in Switzerland itself.

A5.text: Karl Elsener was on the verge of bankruptcy when, in 1896, he developed an improved knife, intended for the use by officers, with tools attached on both sides of the handle using a special spring mechanism, allowing him to use the same spring to hold them in place.
